name: Lupus Boreas, Dominator of Wolves
desc:
The noblest and greatest of souls, who watches over the lupical of Wolvendom.
When the wolfpack is imperiled, it will emerge in the form of a wolf and show forth its fangs and claws.

The wolves of Wolvendom are frightening phantoms to the people of Mondstadt:
A blurred shape flashing through the forest, a chilling howl in the indeterminate distance, the creeping sense of eyes constantly nailed to their backs...
Humans rarely have the opportunity to lock their eyes with a wolf, for this is the law Lupus Boreas laid down for its race.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Dream Solvent
dropMaterial.desc:
An item capable of changing Character Level-Up Materials obtained from memories and trials into whatever form is needed.
People once believed that spirits and memories had some material form. If someone dreamed of heaven before waking up clutching a flower, then that blossom must have been made from such a fantasy. Dream Solvent dissolves that which is obtained from memory and transforms it into some other dream.
Indeed, blows traded with the strong are stepping stones towards becoming stronger yourself.

dropMaterial.name: Northlander Bow Billet
dropMaterial.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star bows.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

dropMaterial.name: Northlander Catalyst Billet
dropMaterial.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star catalysts.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

dropMaterial.name: Northlander Claymore Billet
dropMaterial.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star claymores.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

dropMaterial.name: Northlander Polearm Billet
dropMaterial.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star polearms.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

dropMaterial.name: Northlander Sword Billet
dropMaterial.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star swords.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

dropMaterial.name: Tail of Boreas
dropMaterial.desc:
A handful of tail scales from the Great Wolf King of the North.
Even without his physical body and beyond death, Boreas still possesses extraordinary powers. He took a form comprised of ice and wind to embrace a new challenge, but even such a form could not house all of his power. The ice scales that fell during the battle still retain some of their spiritual energy.

dropMaterial.name: Ring of Boreas
dropMaterial.desc:
A bit of crystallized ice from the Great Wolf King of the North.
This land was once a realm of freezing-cold blizzards and ice storms filled with razor-sharp ice shards, all at the command of Boreas. Though his power may have diminished, he could still freeze the land in an instant.

dropMaterial.name: Spirit Locket of Boreas
dropMaterial.desc:
A bit of the Great Wolf King of the North's power drawn from its soul.
This land was once a realm of freezing-cold blizzards and ice storms filled with razor-sharp ice shards, all at the command of Boreas. In his final moments, he finally realized the chilling north wind could only extinguish life, not nurture it. Therefore, Boreas let his powers freely flow into the land to protect it and its inhabitants.

dropMaterial.name: Shivada Jade Sliver
dropMaterial.desc: Character Ascension Material.

dropMaterial.name: Shivada Jade Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry..."

dropMaterial.name: Shivada Jade Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry..."
"...to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world."

dropMaterial.name: Shivada Jade Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry... to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world.
"Since you could endure my bitter cold, you must have the desire to burn?
"Then, burn away the old world for me."

dropMaterial.name: Prithiva Topaz Sliver
dropMaterial.desc: Character Ascension Material.

dropMaterial.name: Prithiva Topaz Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood."

dropMaterial.name: Prithiva Topaz Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future."

dropMaterial.name: Prithiva Topaz Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future.
This is the trust I have placed in them. Betray it, and you taint my blood."

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Sliver
dropMaterial.desc: Character Ascension Material.

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name..."

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name...
Burnt to cinders for a dream."

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name...
Burnt to cinders for a dream.
If the intention yet remains, achieved ██'s truth he has."

value.name: Andrius
value.desc: The Great Wolf King of the North, a protector of Wolvendom and one of the Four Winds.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Wolf Pact</color>
Defeat the king of Wolvendom in Co-Op Mode.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Whirl of Boreal Wind</color>
Album: City of Winds and Idylls
Track: 62

<color=#ffd780>Symphony of Boreal Wind</color>
